about_the_game:
Your king demands it. The mountain has apparated.
He demands that you scale this mountain for his glory. Whatever the means. Whatever the toll.

Eldercraft: Mountaineers is an RPG about crafting, surviving and exploring. Forge your routes and pathways up the mountain to reach valuable treasures. These will help you forge more pathways that will lead you to the summit.

SURVIVE THE MOUNTAIN

The ground is safe and peaceful. The mountain is harsh and unforgiving. You will die, be reborn and die again. Through sheer will you must scale this mountain.

Delve into forgotten dungeons and long abandoned mines to harvest the resources left behind. Journey to temples and workshops of civilizations lost to time to harness their magic and craft their technology.

EXPLORE LIKE YOU MEAN IT

Explore not only outwards towards the open world of the mountain but inwards to the ancient tomes, delicate ecosystem and most peculiar mysteries the mountain holds.

CRAFT AND BUILD FOR YOUR KING

Crafting is vital. Building is safety. You can only carry so much equipment up the mountain at a time. You can only haul so much loot and materials down.
You better equip yourself to be prepared for any situation.

A storm approaches on the horizon. You see a tower on the next ridge. It must have something of value to be constructed in such a harsh place. Do you risk it and scale over? Can you reach it and descend before the storm hits? You could also play it safe. Stop and stash some equipment here to come back more prepared the next time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB or Intel ARC A580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-13600 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 12GB or AMD Radeon RX 6600 8GB or Intel ARC A770 16GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD
